This is the final movie of the Resident Evil series And it was just what I expected A ha lf-a ssed crap fest of a movie that was rushed into theaters. They reuse the same conflict in every single one of these movies without a clear resolution as to how they re going to defeat the Umbrella Corporation and the apocalypse and the zombie fights would have been cool if it was filmed well. Anything that could have been awesome or cool is squandered by the horrible jump cut editing Every time someone gets into a fight the frame changes every second If a fight lasted for 2 minutes the cut s in that fight scene would be about 120 cuts I m not kidding you can t tell what is happening This also happens to follow a lot of horror movie tropes and continually abuses it Loud noises and jump sca res.. There will be a silence and then ............... BAM !! a loud noise with something popping up. There are a fare amount of night scenes and because the movie is lit so poorly you can t really see the actors faces So whenever they lose a team m ember you don t know who. died ........ and don t care either. The character of Alice is a terrible protagonist too I never got a sense of her personality in any of these movies She makes a lot of dumb decisions like not killing the bad guy when she has the c hance or the fa ct that she falls into almost every single trap that the Umbrella Co has for her. I guess I wasn t expecting muc h. But even then I hated it I m glad they finally ended this franchise so we won t have to see anymore.
